Google Analytics.description: Google Analytics is a web analytics service offered by Google that tracks and reports website traffic.
patterns: Used to distinguish users and sessions.
Used with __utmb to determine new sessions/visits.
Stores the traffic source or campaign that explains how the user reached your site.
Contains campaign-related information for the user.

Google Ads.description: Google Ads is an online advertising platform developed by Google, where advertisers pay to display brief advertisements, service offerings, and product listings.
patterns: Used by Google DoubleClick to register and report the website user's actions after viewing or clicking on one of the advertiser's ads.
Used to link a user’s activity across devices.
A DoubleClick cookie that carries out information about how the end user uses the website.
Used to link your activity across devices if you've previously signed in to your Google account.
Used to link your activity across devices if you've previously signed in to your Google account.
Used by Google's ad exchange to register and report the website user's actions.
Used by Google AdSense to experiment with advertisement efficiency across websites using their services.

Facebook Pixel.description: Facebook Pixel is an analytics tool that allows you to measure the effectiveness of your advertising by understanding the actions people take on your website.
patterns: Used by Facebook to deliver a series of advertisement products such as real-time bidding from third-party advertisers.
Used by Facebook to deliver, measure, and improve the relevancy of ads.

HubSpot.description: HubSpot is a CRM platform that provides tools for sales, marketing, and customer service.
patterns: The main cookie for tracking visitors.
Used to determine if the visitor has restarted their browser.
Used to keep track of sessions.
Keeps track of a visitor's identity.

LinkedIn.description: LinkedIn uses cookies to personalize your experience and improve its services.
patterns: Used by LinkedIn for tracking the use of embedded services.
Browser ID cookie used for tracking the use of embedded services.
Used to track visitors on multiple websites, to present relevant ads based on the visitor's preferences.
Opt-out cookie to disable LinkedIn data collection.
Used for tracking the use of LinkedIn embedded services.

Twitter.description: Twitter uses cookies to improve and personalize your experience on its platform.
patterns: This cookie is set due to Twitter integration and sharing capabilities for the social media.
Used by Twitter to identify and track users.

Adobe Analytics.description: Adobe Analytics is a web analytics service that provides detailed information about website traffic and performance.
patterns: Determines whether cookies are enabled in the user's browser.
Used to collect information about how end users navigate the site.

Quantcast.description: Quantcast provides audience insights and real-time advertising data.
patterns: Collects data on the user’s visits to the website, such as what pages have been loaded.
Collects anonymous data on the user's website visits.

Hotjar.description: Hotjar provides analytics and feedback data from your website’s visitors.
patterns: Determines if the user is included in the data sampling defined by your site's daily session limit.
Assigns a unique ID to the user and logs user behavior on the website.
Used to identify a new user’s first session.
Counts how many times a website has been visited by different users.
Used to determine the most generic cookie path to use.

Crazy Egg.description: Crazy Egg is a tool that provides heatmaps and recordings of visitor behavior on a website.
patterns: Tracks whether a user has visited the site before.

Bing Ads.description: Bing Ads uses cookies to track conversions and retarget ads to users who have visited the website.
patterns: Used by Bing Ads to engage with a user that has previously visited the website.
Used by Bing Ads to engage with a user that has previously visited the website.

New Relic.description: New Relic provides performance monitoring for websites and web applications.
patterns: Used by New Relic to store a session identifier so that New Relic can monitor session counts for an application.

Yandex Metrica.description: Yandex Metrica is a web analytics tool that tracks and reports website traffic.
patterns: Stores the date of the user's first site session.
Used to determine if the user has ad blockers.

Matomo.description: Matomo is an open-source web analytics platform that provides detailed reports on website traffic.
patterns: Used to store a few details about the user such as the unique visitor ID.
Short lived cookies used to temporarily store data for the visit.

Cloudflare.description: Cloudflare is a content delivery network and security service that protects websites from online threats.
patterns: Used by Cloudflare to identify individual clients behind a shared IP address and apply security settings on a per-client basis.
Used for load balancing to optimize service efficiency.

Microsoft Clarity.description: Microsoft Clarity is a user behavior analytics tool that helps you understand how users interact with your website.
patterns: Connects multiple page views by a user into a single Clarity session recording.
Persists the Clarity User ID and preferences, unique to that site, on the browser.

Reddit Pixel.description: Reddit Pixel tracks conversions from Reddit ads.
patterns: Used by Reddit to track user behavior across the web.

DoubleClick (Google).description: DoubleClick is a subsidiary of Google that develops and provides Internet ad serving services.
patterns: Used to check if the user's browser supports cookies.
Used for targeting, analyzing and optimizing ad campaigns.
Used to serve ads and measure interactions with them.

AppNexus.description: AppNexus is a cloud-based software platform that enables and optimizes programmatic online advertising.
patterns: Used by AppNexus to store a unique user ID that recognizes the user on returning visits.
Collects anonymous information about users' visits to the website.

Amazon Advertising.description: Amazon Advertising provides ad solutions for brands to connect with the right audience on Amazon and beyond.
patterns: Used for ad tracking and retargeting.
Stores user preferences for Amazon's ad services.

AddThis.description: AddThis is a social bookmarking service that can be integrated into a website with the use of a web widget.
patterns: Enables users to share content across different networking and sharing forums.
Ensures that the updated share count is displayed to the user if they share a page and return to it before the share count cache is updated.

Mixpanel.description: Mixpanel is an advanced analytics service that helps improve web and mobile applications by tracking user interactions.
patterns: Used by Mixpanel to analyze traffic and user activity.

ClickDimensions.description: ClickDimensions provides email marketing and marketing automation solutions for Microsoft Dynamics CRM.
patterns: Used to track individual visitors and their site usage.
Used to track individual sessions on the website.
Used to signal the last time a visitor viewed a page.

Segment.description: Segment is a customer data platform that helps collect and manage user data.
patterns: Used to track user activity on a website.
Stores the user ID in Segment.

Pinterest.description: Pinterest uses cookies to track the usage of its services and user interactions.
patterns: Used by Pinterest to track the usage of services.
Used for tracking the use of embedded services.
Used for tracking referrals from Pinterest.

Snapchat.description: Snapchat uses cookies to deliver and measure the performance of ads.
patterns: Used by Snapchat to provide ad analytics.
Used for tracking conversions from ads.

TikTok.description: TikTok uses cookies to track and optimize ads served on the platform.
patterns: Used to identify a user on TikTok.
Tracks the effectiveness of ads on TikTok.

Taboola.description: Taboola provides content discovery and recommendation services for online publishers.
patterns: Used to determine which pages and services are relevant to users.
Used to track user interactions with Taboola services.

Outbrain.description: Outbrain provides content marketing and recommendation services.
patterns: Tracks user interactions with Outbrain's recommendation widgets.
Used for tracking user activity across the web.

Quantcast Measure.description: Quantcast Measure helps companies measure, understand, and optimize their digital audiences.
patterns: Collects data about the user's browsing activity.
Collects anonymous data on the user's website visits.

Tealium.description: Tealium provides tag management and customer data platform services.
patterns: Used by Tealium to manage and track user interactions with different services.
